short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to record web elements DOM data and converts it into a JSON file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpurCapture is a powerful Chrome extension developed by SpurQLabs that simplifies the process of identifying and capturing unique web element locators directly from the Document Object Model (DOM) of any web page. With SpurCapture, web developers and testers can effortlessly extract, view and export these locators in JSON format. This streamlined tool enhances web development efficiency by enabling users to quickly gather essential data for their projects, making it an indispensable companion for anyone working on web applications or websites. Say goodbye to manual locator identification and hello to the convenience of SpurCapture.
